about_the_game:
After beasts overwhelm the forest and her father going missing, Neya finds herself forced to pick up the sword and fight the forces of darkness to uncover the cause. Despite her young age, she has to muster the courage to claim her role as the guardian of the forest and protect her realm from evil.
    [*Explore a fairy-tale fantasy world with locations like ancient forest ruins, dangerous swamps, and dark caves.*Run, jump, avoid traps, solve puzzles, slash enemies, and find hidden treasures throughout this world.*fight different enemies from corrupted forest creatures, to beasts, and others.*Experience an emotional story.*Meet different characters, friends or foes, and gather information that will help you on your quest.]

short_description: Immerse yourself in this action platformer as you run, jump, slash beasts, solve puzzles, avoid deadly traps, and find hidden treasures in this fairy-tale fantasy world. Take the role of a young girl who finds herself tasked with the burden of saving her realm from evil.
